TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Ruba’, title = Ruba’, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ruba’} }

S.FORM: alang Ruba' ga niya mki sku Sincik Keng atu Gpho go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 77 buwan, 220 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 97% kyan ku 213 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 3% kyan ku 7 hi nya. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Ruba' hya' ga llyung. tay 'zil na Ruba' hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Ruba' hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Ruba' hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Ruba' hya' ga Kukung. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Roba' ga niya mki sko Sincik Keng ato Gpho go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 77 bowan, 220 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 97% kyan ko 213 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 3% kyan ko 7 hi nya. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Roba' hya' ga llyong. tay 'zil na Roba' hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Roba' hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Roba' hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na Roba' hya' ga Kokong. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
